text:
Hey Jaydip, it looks like you should be able to do this based on the documentation here: <https://www.linkedin.com/help/lms/answer/65688/linkedin-autofill-setup-guide?lang=en>

> *Note:*Â LinkedIn AutoFill is currently available on a limited basis and only for customers with a managed account. If you have a managed account, please contact your account representative for more details.
Is this the functionality that you are referring to? Want to make sure I am not missing anything. I can pass this feedback along to some of our internal teams but want to make sure this is the correct thing we are talking about.
Would anyone else find it useful if you could add release notes to revisions in the design manager?
